Module kivakit.validation
Package com.telenav.kivakit.validation

Class ValidationType

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.name.Name
com.telenav.kivakit.validation.ValidationType
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString
Direct Known Subclasses:
ValidateAll
public class ValidationType extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.name.Name
A kind of validation as restricted to a particular set of Validatable types.

validateAll() specifies that values of all types should be validated. Calling include(Class) can specify one or more specific types of values to validate. An object which is Validatable can then implement Validatable.validator(ValidationType) by returning different Validator implementations depending on the type of ValidationType requested or by doing validation conditionally depending on what shouldValidate(Class) returns for one or more different target types.

Factory Methods

  • validateAll()

Filtering Validatables

  • include(Class)
  • exclude(Class)
  • shouldValidate(Class)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
